name: Found (itch) (kaylapotter)
description:
Current version of Found Team 4- Attempting to fix problems with first upload since we received feedback it was uploaded incorrectly and unplayable. 

Navigate through the lost and found and escape to find your way back to your owner! Watch out for the other toys... 

Some questions we have: 

1) Is our movement fluid or are you running into a lot of glitches with fluidity? 

2) How can we improve our camera?
